snippet: On April 5, 1951, Julius and Ethel Rosenberg were sentenced to death for conspiring to commit espionage for the Soviet Union.
abstract: On April 5, 1951, Julius and Ethel Rosenberg were sentenced to death for conspiring to commit espionage for the Soviet Union.

headline.main: April 5, 1951 | Judge Sentences Julius and Ethel Rosenberg to Death for Espionage
